DOC.detailed_description: 200 BD 200 Non-BD patient check psychological symptom Symptom Check List 90 Revised ( SCL90-R ) . BD diagnosis base new International Criteria Behcet 's Disease ( ICBD ) . Non-BD patient patient mimic BD . All patient ask complete SCL90-R attend clinic routine follow-up . The demographic information disease manifestation include ocular neurological involvement register . For visual impairment , SCL90-R apply interviewer . Frequencies descriptive analysis measure BD Non-BD group . Means standard deviation ( SD ) visual acuity calculate . Data collect SCL90-R normal distribution dimension . The mean value raw number , global severity index ( GSI ) , positive symptom total ( PST ) positive symptom distress index ( PSDI ) , compare Mann-Whitney U ( M-W U ) test . ) .To detect bias result due data collection method , self report data reviewer collect data compare .
